Banner.Description: I am a recent Bachelor of Computer Science graduate (2024) from Monash University with a strong academic record (CGPA: 3.87/4.0, WAM: 83.4). My expertise spans Angular, React, React Native, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, and other modern front-end technologies. With years of experience in building high-performance, scalable web and mobile applications, I specialize in delivering well-structured code and seamless user experiences. My solid foundation in software development, parallel computing, and full-stack development, combined with proficiency in DevOps practices and cloud-based version control systems, enables me to contribute effectively to innovative projects while continuously pushing the boundaries of modern development practices.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: As a fresh Computer Science graduate, I am passionate about software development, artificial intelligence, and problem-solving. My academic journey has equipped me with a strong foundation in full-stack development, software engineering, and machine learning. Through my coursework and projects, I've gained experience with various technologies ranging from Python, Java, and JavaScript to modern frameworks like Angular and Springboot. My technical toolkit includes full-stack development with MongoDB and SQL databases, version control with GitHub, and data visualization using Tableau. I've also explored AI applications and machine learning models, enhancing my analytical and problem-solving capabilities.

Being trilingual in English, Chinese (both fluent), and Bahasa Melayu (intermediate), I'm eager to contribute my technical skills and multicultural perspective to innovative development teams that push the boundaries of technology.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Intern
Description: Supported the Cloud Licensing Sales Team in various sales tasks
Collaborated with team to gather cloud product information
Assisted in preparing sales materials for client meetings
Assisted in tracking sales progress and reports
Conducted market research to identify potential clients
Participated in client meetings, aiding in solution presentations

Experience.Jobs.Title: Java, Mobile and Full Stack Developer Intern
Description: Updated the company intranet with new features and upgraded it to version 2.0 using Angular and Spring Boot.
Contributed to the development and bug fixes of a Live Translation Video Call Chat project for client consultations.
Implemented solutions to store call data and transcripts for future use.
Integrated Microsoft Azure for hosting, real-time translation, and AI functionalities.

FeatureProjects.Title: Projects that I've done
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Functional Reactive Tetris: A Pure FP Implementation with RxJS
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Developed a modern Tetris implementation using pure functional programming principles and reactive streams. The game showcases immutable state management and Observable-based event handling through RxJS. Features include real-time piece movement, rotation mechanics, and collision detection - all implemented using pure functions and reactive streams. The architecture demonstrates declarative programming principles with state transitions managed through Observable chains and functional composition.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: POS System
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Built a POS e-commerce platform for selling plants with Razor API payment gateway integration for secure transactions. Features an AI-powered Gemini chatbot for product recommendations and custom HTML email templates for order confirmations and updates. Includes real-time inventory tracking, sales analytics, and role-based access control, ensuring scalability and security.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Youth Labor and Education Visualisation
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Created a Tableau visualization to analyze Malaysia's youth labor market and education trends. Highlights gender disparities, employment outcomes, and education-to-job market relationships. Features time-based trends for future predictions and aids policymakers and young job seekers in making data-driven decisions.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Malaysian Demographics and Socioeconomic
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Developed an interactive visualization tool to analyze Malaysia's demographics and socioeconomic factors, focusing on population distribution and income levels across states and districts. Enabled users to explore population trends and economic disparities through dynamic charts and maps. Designed for policymakers, researchers, and businesses, the tool supports data-driven decision-making in resource allocation and regional development.

OtherProjects.Title: More personal projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: My Recipe Book
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Created an app displaying various cuisines, each containing a list of recipes with details on ingredients. Users can add or remove recipes from their favorites, utilizing a combination of Native Stack Navigator and Drawer Navigator for seamless navigation.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Translate App
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Built a text translation app using React, enabling real-time language detection and translation through a third-party API with a clean, user-friendly interface.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Expense Tracker
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Created an Expense Tracker app that enables users to add, remove, edit, and fetch expenses, providing insights into their spending. It utilizes an external API built with Firebase for real-time data synchronization.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Guess My Number
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Developed a simple game called 'Guess My Number' where players input a number, and the app attempts to guess it. Players indicate whether their number is lower or higher than the guessed number, and once the correct guess is made, a game-over screen displays the winning number.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message.
